extendedInfo.description: Creates FTP server on your Android device- Exchange files with any PC or device which runs FTP client;- No need to use USB cable;- Widget;- English and Russian languages are supported.

reviews.title: Problematic, and no widget on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Thanks, this compact app does as described and works well on Samsung GS2 phone and Nexus 7 tablet. However, the widget doesn\'t appear to be available on the N7 (it\'s fine on SGS2). N7 is running Android 4.1.1, SGS2 running 4.0.3. UPDATE: I\'ve found that when a file is deleted, the file remains but with a zero byte file size. Also the widget icon status doesn\'t update on the SGS2. As file deletion is a very basic function, I\'ve revised severely my rating of this app downward.
reviews.author: A Google User
